arStrings.szText: After attacking enemies with a {c_important}Basic{/c} Skill, increase the damage of your next {c_important}Core{/c} Skill cast within {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} seconds by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c}, up to {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|%x|]{/c}.
{c_important}Basic{/c} Skills increase the damage of your next {c_important}Core{/c} Skill by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c}.
